motions.title: Move Discussion Item #14 to Business Items
motions.description: Motion to amend the agenda to move item #14 (Request for Pre-Construction Funding for Real Time Crime Center) to the last item under Business Items.

motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • March 25, 2024 meeting minutes • Conversion of contracted positions and creation of new city position for Technology Department • Amendment of position allocation and compensation chart and market adjustment for city employees • Agreement for managed networking service provider • Funding authorization for 5695 Trowbridge Drive storm repairs

motions.title: Parks and Recreation Sign Package Contract Award

motions.title: North Shallowford Annex Maintenance Repairs Contract Award
motions.description: Award contract to Southern Preservation Systems for North Shallowford Annex maintenance repairs in amount of $198,800 including 10% contingency.

motions.title: Real Time Crime Center Pre-Construction Funding
motions.description: Approval of pre-construction funding for Real Time Crime Center modifications in amount of $53,670.69 funded with SPLOST funds.

publicHearings.title: RZ 23-03: 245 Perimeter Center Parkway Rezoning (First Read)
publicHearings.description: First read of rezoning from PDc to PDc to amend zoning conditions to allow mixed-use project including office, hotel, and multifamily residential with retail, restaurant, amenity space, and structured parking.
publicHearings.details: Building 4 to have 300,000 sf office space, 22,000 sf retail/restaurant, 175-room hotel, 300 dwelling units, 1,565 parking spaces
